languages.text: "Благодаря старанию старших офицеров, все отсеки смогли в той или иной мере взять ситуацию под контроль. Потери на палубах минимальны, общее число жертв не превышает двух тысяч голов".
"Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
languages.original_text: "Благодаря старанию старших офицеров, все отсеки смогли в той или иной мере взять ситуацию под контроль. Потери на палубах минимальны, общее число жертв не превышает двух тысяч голов".

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on decks are minimal, the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
"Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on decks are minimal, the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
"Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
"Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
"Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

languages.text: “由于高阶军官的不懈努力，我们成功地想办法控制住了局势。甲板上的伤亡并不严重，损失的船员数量不超过两千人。”
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

traits.locale_text: “由于高阶军官的不懈努力，我们成功地想办法控制住了局势。甲板上的伤亡并不严重，损失的船员数量不超过两千人。”

languages.text: «Gracias a los esfuerzos de los oficiales veteranos, hemos logrado controlar la situación. Las pérdidas en nuestras cubiertas son mínimas y no hemos superado las dos mil bajas».
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a los esfuerzos de los oficiales veteranos, hemos logrado controlar la situación. Las pérdidas en nuestras cubiertas son mínimas y no hemos superado las dos mil bajas».

languages.text: "Dank der Bemühungen der Führungsoffiziere ist es uns gelungen, die Situation unter Kontrolle zu bringen. Die Verluste auf den Decks sind minimal, und die Zahl der Opfer übersteigt nicht zweitausend Seelen."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

languages.text: « Nous avons réussi à reprendre le contrôle de la situation grâce aux efforts des officiers supérieurs. Les pertes sur les ponts sont minimes, et le nombre de victimes ne dépasse pas les deux mille âmes. »
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons réussi à reprendre le contrôle de la situation grâce aux efforts des officiers supérieurs. Les pertes sur les ponts sont minimes, et le nombre de victimes ne dépasse pas les deux mille âmes. »

languages.text: 「上級士官達が尽力したおかげで、事態を収拾することができました。デッキの被害は最小限で、死傷者数は2,000人に収まっています」
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."

traits.locale_text: 「上級士官達が尽力したおかげで、事態を収拾することができました。デッキの被害は最小限で、死傷者数は2,000人に収まっています」

languages.text: "Kıdemli subaylarımızın çabaları sayesinde sorunu kontrol altına almayı başardık. Güvertelerdeki kayıplar minimal düzeyde ve zayiat sayısı iki binin altında."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to the efforts of senior officers, we did manage to get the situation under control. The losses on the decks are minimal, and the number of casualties does not exceed two thousand souls."
